title: How to learn to sing online for free - Quora

response.answer_text: New York Vocal Coaching has a great series online. He looks kind of like Leonardo DiCaprio too, lol. New York Vocal Coaching If you watch all of these and practice them for a week each, you’ll have mostly all of the basics down and probably be able to sing better than 99 out of 100 people already. Most people don’t take the time to actually learn the techniques cause they just assume that they are a bad singer and can’t learn to be good. You’ll have to train both your voice and your ear, and this guy only really goes into voice training. To train your ear, make sure you record yourself as much as you can, and listen for areas that need work, then re-record until you have fixed the major problems. Nobody said it would be easy ;)
